saving and loading
[function for interpolation (func)]


Functions

bool surfit::func_load (const char *filename, const char *funcname=0)
 loads surfit_func named 'funcname' from ROFF file (see datafile for details)
bool surfit::func_load_grd (const char *filename, const char *funcname=0)
 loads surfit_func from SURFER grd file (ASCII format)
void surfit::func_unload ()
 unloads surfit_func from memory
bool surfit::func_save (const char *filename, const char *funcname=0)
 saves surfit_func to ROFF file (see datafile) named filename in active rw_mode
bool surfit::func_save_grd (const char *filename)
 saves surfit_func to SURFER grd file (ASCII format)
bool surfit::func_save_xyz (const char *filename)
 saves surfit_func to XYZ text format
bool surfit::func_save_bmp (const char *filename)
 saves surfit_func to Windows-BMP file with surfit_color_scale
